text: American Guerrilla in the Philippines (released as I Shall Return in the UK) is a 1950 American war movie directed by Fritz Lang and is based on the 1945 book of the same name by Ira Wolfert. It stars Tyrone Power, Micheline Presle and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. == Other websites == * Category:1950 movies Category:1950s war movies Category:American war movies Category:World War II movies Category:Movies directed by Fritz Lang Category:Movies based on books Category:20th Century Fox movies
title: American Guerrilla in the Philippines
